stylproj.featuresets package¶

Submodules¶

stylproj.featuresets.basic9 module¶

class stylproj.featuresets.basic9.Basic9Extractor¶

Bases: stylproj.featuresets.feature_extract.FeatureSetExtractor

The Basic-9 feature set extractor.[1]

[1] Michael Brennan and Rachel Greenstadt. Practical Attacks Against Authorship Recognition Techniques in Proceedings of the Twenty-First Conference on Innovative Applications of Artificial Intelligence (IAAI), Pasadena, California, July 2009.

stylproj.featuresets.feature_extract module¶

class stylproj.featuresets.feature_extract.FeatureSetExtractor¶

Bases: object

Superclass that all feature sets should extend.

extract(text)¶

The procedure to extract all of the features from a body of text. Returns a list of extracted features.
